channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 22:49 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 🟠 22:49 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
